robosell_is_your_reliable_partner_in_cre: ROBOSELL is your reliable partner in creating and managing your online business. Our goal is to make the process of starting an internet business fast, simple and efficient for entrepreneurs.
everything_you_need_to_know_about_the_pr: Everything you need to know about the product and billing.
robosell_is_a_full_featured_constructor_: Robosell is a full-featured constructor for creating websites and Telegram bots, ideally suited for the HoReCa sector and any type of store looking to launch online sales. Our platform provides entrepreneurs with all the necessary tools to launch and manage their online business.
with_wobosell_any_entrepreneur_can_creat: With Robosell, any entrepreneur can create their online business and start accepting orders within 24 hours. In our platform, you will find everything you need for efficient management of your business: an admin panel for managing products, sales, employees, marketing, integrations with payment systems, POS systems, warehouses, and many other aspects.
our_mission_is_to_make_life_easier_for_e: Our mission is to make life easier for entrepreneurs by making the process of launching and managing an online business simple and accessible. Every day, we strive to improve the world of online business, helping entrepreneurs achieve their goals and increase their income.
simplicity_and_speed_create_a_telegram_b: Simplicity and Speed: Create a Telegram bot or website in just 15 minutes.
business_management_use_our_admin_panel_: Business Management: Use our admin panel for complete control over your business.
integrations_take_advantage_of_integrati: Integrations: Take advantage of integrations with payment systems, POS systems, and warehouses, bringing everything together in a unified platform. This significantly simplifies management and allows you to focus on business development.
revenue_growth_increase_revenue_by_simpl: Revenue Growth: Increase revenue by simplifying the order process for your customers.
customer_loyalty_make_the_ordering_proce: Customer Loyalty: Make the ordering process convenient and attract repeat customers.
currently_robosell_platform_is_used_in_m: Currently, Robosell platform is used in more than 4 countries, including Uzbekistan, Russia, Kazakhstan, Korea, and others. We have more than 10,000 registered users, over 20,000 Telegram bots and websites created, and over 100,000 products sold through our platform. The platform supports over 50 integrations with various systems and services, and customer satisfaction exceeds 95%.
we_have_been_operating_in_the_uzbekistan: We have been operating in the Uzbekistan market since 2022. The average revenue growth of our users is more than 2 times. The platform is available in three languages: Russian, Uzbek, and English.
robosell_is_the_core_of_your_business: Robosell is the core of your business, through which you can efficiently manage all aspects of your enterprise and succeed in the online space. With us, you can simplify the ordering process for your customers and turn them into loyal buyers.
create_your_online_store_with_robosell_i: Create your online store with Robosell in just <linkTag>15 minutes</linkTag>
become_the_new_model_of_online_business_: Become the new model of online business success by selling products or services anywhere and to any audience.
can_t_find_the_answer_you_are_looking_fo: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Contact our responsive team for support.
name: Name
what_type_of_businesses_is_your_platform: What type of businesses is your platform suitable for?
how_do_i_create_a_website: How do I create a website?
how_do_i_create_a_telegram_bot: How do I create a Telegram bot?
our_platform_is_suitable_for_businesses_: Our platform is suitable for businesses in the food service and retail sectors.
for_food_service_robosell_is_ideal_for_r: For Food Service: Robosell is ideal for restaurants, cafes, and other food service establishments that want to launch delivery services. With our platform, you can easily create your own Telegram bot or website for receiving delivery orders, simplifying the customer service process and increasing your revenue.
for_retail_stores_if_you_own_a_retail_st: For Retail Stores: If you own a retail store and want to sell your products online, our platform provides all the necessary tools for successfully launching an online store. You can quickly and easily create a website or bot for online sales, manage your product inventory, orders, and interact with customers.
yes_you_can_use_the_full_functionality_f: Yes, you can use the full functionality for creating a Telegram bot and your own website for the first 7 days. During this time, you can fully evaluate our platform and see how effective it is for your business. This trial period gives you access to all the tools and features needed to successfully launch and manage your online business. After the trial period ends, you will have the option to choose a suitable pricing plan to continue using all the features of Robosell.
when_registering_on_the_robosell_platfor: When registering on the Robosell platform, you can choose to create either a Telegram bot or a website. If you choose to create a website, you will need to add your own domain or use a subdomain with a name of your choice. The step-by-step process is as follows:
registration_register_on_the_robosell_pl: Registration: Register on the Robosell platform.
project_type_selection_choose_the_option: Project Type Selection: Choose the option to create a website.
domain_setup_add_your_own_domain_or_use_: Domain Setup: Add your own domain or use a subdomain provided by the platform.
design_and_content_customize_your_websit: Design and Content: Customize your website's design, add necessary information, products, and services.
launch_after_setting_up_and_verifying_al: Launch: After setting up and verifying all parameters, launch your website and start receiving orders.
yes_for_your_convenience: Yes, for your convenience, we have added support for payment systems such as Payme, Click, Payze, Atmos, and many others. You can choose the payment system that suits you best and integrate it with just a few clicks. This allows you to quickly and securely accept online payments from your customers, ensuring convenience for both you and your buyers.
when_registering_on_the_robosell_platfor: When registering on the Robosell platform, you will be offered the option to create either a Telegram bot or a website. If you choose to create a Telegram bot, follow these simple steps:
project_Type_selection_choose_the_option: Project Type Selection: Choose the option to create a Telegram bot.
enter_token_enter_your_bot_token_which_y: Enter Token: Enter your bot token, which you can get by creating a bot through <linkTag>@BotFather</linkTag> on Telegram.
setup_configure_the_functions_and_comman: Setup: Configure the functions and commands of your bot using the platform’s user-friendly interface.
launch_after_completing_the_setup_activa: Launch: After completing the setup, activate your bot and start using it for your business.
